text: 9.47 Mat 5.29 Pen wɨdɨn mɨdup olap tap si tap tɨmel gɨnɨg gonɨmuŋ, wɨdɨn pɨs kɨd anɨb ak tɨg juyokem, pɨs kɨd nokom olap nep yonɨmuŋ agak. Nak wɨdɨn kɨd nokom olap yenɨgab ak, God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab ak amɨl pelpel yenɨgaban, tap teplep yɨbɨl agak. Pen wɨdɨn nak kɨd omɨŋal yenɨgab ak, mab ke yɨneb amnɨgaban, tap tɨmel yɨbɨl agak.
